implementation.useCase: Decagon uses Claude to create AI agents that deliver personalized, 24/7 customer service. These agents integrate with existing ticketing systems and customer databases to provide white-glove support at scale, handling simple inquiries to complex processes that previously required human agents.
implementation.problem: Providing affordable, high-quality, personalized customer support. Traditional automated systems frustrate customers with irrelevant help articles or generic responses that feel impersonal and put the burden on customers.
implementation.integrationMethod: Integration with existing ticketing systems and customer databases

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Due to Claude's ability to follow complex instructions and policies exactly
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: • Sees higher customer satisfaction due to Claude's ability to follow complex instructions and policies exactly

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Freeing up time and resources for growing their business
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: • Decreased their own customer support volume, freeing up times and resources for growing their business

qualitativeBenefits.detail: AI agents complete tasks for customers rather than just providing instructions
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: With Claude, end-users resolve issues without human intervention in most cases. Sreenivas explains, "It's not just about answering questions - our AI agents actually complete tasks for customers. Rather than giving instructions for a refund, the agent checks your eligibility, processes the refund through the payment system, and handles all the steps a human agent would have done. From the customer's perspective, it's as good as talking to a skilled support representative."

qualitativeBenefits.detail: AI agents adhere to company policies and practices with high accuracy
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Thanks to Claude, Decagon's customers are deploying AI agents that adhere to their policies and practices with remarkable accuracy, representing their brand voice with high fidelity in every interaction.
